card.name: CW01 Doomed Traveler
card.text: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: CW02 Sister of the Mass
card.text: When another creature or artifact you control is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, gain 1 life.

card.name: CW03 Pious Fool
card.text: Lifelink When Pious Fool dies, create a Shovel token. (Its an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this: Surveil 2.”)

card.name: CW05 Disfigured Yearling
card.text: Flying Unsettled — When Disfigured Yearling attacks, if a card left your graveyard this turn, it gains +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: CW06 Miner Adept
card.text: Vigilance When Miner Adept attacks, Dig 1. (You may exile a cards from your graveyard: Create a tapped Treasure, Trinket, or Shovel token. Repeat )

card.name: CW04 Blade Naturalist
card.text: First strike

card.name: CW07 Student of the Old Way
card.text: {W}: Student of the Old Way gains your choice of First strike or Vigilance until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: CW08 Scrapheap Scout
card.text: When Scrapheap Scout attacks, create a Trinket token. (It’s an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”) Unearth {4}

card.name: CW09 Spirit of Faded Dreams
card.text: Flying When Spirit of Faded Dreams enters, exile up to one target card from a graveyard. Intrude 1W (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its intrude cost. When it enters or if it would leave the field, exile it.)

card.name: CW10 Memory of the Many
card.text: Vigilance 3W: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: CW11 Knight of High Peaks
card.text: Flying When Knight of High Peaks enters, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control. Intrude 2W (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its intrude cost. When it enters or if it would leave the field, exile it.)

card.name: CW12 Moment of Valor
card.text: Choose one — • Untap target creature. It gets +1/+0 and gains indestructible until end of turn. • Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: CW14 Grim Confrontation
card.text: Deal 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. If it was a token, deal 5 damage to it instead.

card.name: CW15 Bedtime Whispers
card.text: Exile up to one target card in a graveyard. Create a tapped 1/1 white Spirit creature token.

card.name: CU01 Vicious Pixie
card.text: Flying 2U: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: CU02 Doomed Mariners
card.text: Vigilance When Doomed mariners dies, Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: CU05 Haunt of Buyan
card.text: Flying Prowess

card.name: CU04 Buyan Diver
card.text: Flash When Buyan Diver enters, tap target creature an opponent controls. Intrude 2U (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its intrude cost. When it enters or if it would leave the field, exile it.)

card.name: CU06 Faceless Hexmage
card.text: When Faceless Hexmage enters, look at the top two cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: CU07 East Wind Brother
card.text: When East Wind Brother enters, draw a card, then discard a card. Intrude 2U (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its intrude cost. When it enters or if it would leave the field, exile it.)

card.name: CU03 Serenity Seawitch
card.text: Unsettled — Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on East Wind Brother. It can’t be blocked this turn.

card.name: CU08 Awakened Crustacean
card.text: Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile two instant or sorcery cards from your graveyard.

card.name: CU09 Faceless Mourner
card.text: When Faceless Mourner enters, mill four cards, then Gravecast 4. (Exile up to one instant or sorcery from your graveyard with mana value 4 or less. You may cast it from exile until the end of your next turn. If a spell cast this way would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.)

card.name: CU10 Muffle
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

card.name: CU11 Soul Read
card.text: Choose one — • Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}. • Draw two cards.

card.name: CU12 Mind Choir
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if it targets a token. The owner of target nonland permanent puts it on the top or bottom of their library.

card.name: CU13 Shore Up
card.text: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and hexproof until end of turn. Untap it. (This permanent can’t be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

card.name: CU15 Consider
card.text: Surveil 1. Draw a card.

card.name: CB05 Pledge Cursed

card.text: Flash Unsettled — When Six-Mouth Stalker enters, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. If a card left your graveyard this turn, up to six target creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn instead.

card.text: Exile up to one target card from a graveyard. Target creature you control gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a token. Exile target creature.

card.name: CB14 Overwhelming Grief

card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target enchantment. • Exile target card from a graveyard.

card.name: CG11 Bad Turn
card.text: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If its a token, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don’t control.

card.name: CG12 Scout a Clearing
